Conjuration 5

Summon Fall Bears
Ritual
E3
spell id [id]: 785
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 512
number of effects [nreff]: 505
gems required [gemcost]: 12E
Summon Units:#512 Fall Bear x 5+[1/2 lvl]
The caster summons and binds five Fall Bears. The Fall Bear is one of the four seasonal spirits. It is a large, ethereal bear. It is a magical, mindless being that must be commanded by a mage.
